settings.heading: Subscription
settings.subtext: Remember to offer beautiful flowers from Kyiv LuxeBouquets Valentines Day, Mothers Day, Christmas... Reminds you 7 days before. No spam or sharing your address

settings.tw-footer__form-success: font-medium text-mobile-links text-brand-black p-2 flex gap-2 items-center w-full justify-center
